name: Astra: Laboratory Escape
description:
In 2199, Earth has been invaded by an alien race called Shikelis, In order to analyze human life, Shikelis have taken a few samples of human species to their own space laboratory, which is known as Area 15. One day, there is a meteor crashing Area 15, causing a sample to wake up. The sample now sees the opportunity to escape, but the escape will not be an easy task, as another Shikelis' guards and evolved human beings, called Homomunis has been ordered to block the ones who is escaping. Will the sample make it into the escape?
